body:
Hi Erik,


If you assume a 400 lux level averaged over room surfaces, and 40%  
average reflectance, you get:


	400 lux * 40% / pi / 179 lm/watt


= 0.28 watts/sr/meter^2


which is the value you give to the -av option (i.e., -av 0.28 0.28  
0.28).


-Greg
